entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
